Description:
Position Title:              SAP Quality Assurance ConsultantEmployment Type:      9-month contract- renewableSalary:                         up to 45K SAR all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Riyadh, KSAAbout the Client:A highly recognized international group handling Information Technology Services to various industries located in Riyadh, KSAJob Description:Quality Assurance Planning. Collaborate with project teams to define quality assurance strategies, test plans, and testing schedules for SAP implementations and upgrades
Test Design and Execution. Develop comprehensive test scenarios, test cases, and test scripts based on functional and technical specifications
Defect Management. Identify, report, and track defects using relevant defect tracking tools. Work closely with developers and functional consultants to resolve issues and ensure timely fixes
Test Automation. Assess opportunities for test automation and implement automated testing frameworks to improve testing efficiency and accuracy
Documentation and Reporting. Create and maintain comprehensive testing documentation, including test plans, test cases, test scripts, and test execution resultsSkills
Skills:
Open to Arabic nationals
Male, 45 years old and below
At least 6 years of experience in SAP quality assurance and testing
Project Management certification (PMP, PRINCE2, etc.) is preferred
Immediate joiners or with maximum 1 month notice will be prioritized
